bill_title: prohibit deceptive practices in the advertising and sale of food products as meat and poultry.

bill_versions.bill_text: An Act to prohibit deceptive practices in the advertising and sale of food products as meat and poultry. Be it enacted by the Legislature of the State of South Dakota: Section 1. That § 39-4-18 be AMENDED: 39-4-18. It is a Class 2 misdemeanor for any person to manufacture : (1) Manufacture any article of food which that is adulterated or misbranded, within the meaning of this chapter; (2) Advertise, display, illustrate, represent, offer for sale, or sell a food product, as meat for human consumption, knowing that the product does not comply with the definition of meat, as set forth in § 39-5-6; or (3) Advertise, display, illustrate, represent, offer for sale, or sell a food product, as poultry for human consumption, knowing that the product does not comply with the definition of poultry, as set forth in § 39-4-26.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
Withdrawn at the Request of the Prime Sponsor
